message.entry: Unable to connect to the serialport device at port ''{0}''. Verify that a device is connected to the port, the port is not in use, and all serialport input arguments and parameter values are supported by the device.
Invalid input arguments. Valid syntax is {0}.
Unable to display properties because the serialport object ''{0}'' no longer exists.
Incorrect number of input arguments. Each parameter name must be followed by a corresponding value.
Terminator value must be "LF", "CR", "CR/LF", or an integer from 0 to 255, inclusive.
BaudRate must be a scalar positive integer.
BytesAvailableFcn must be a function handle.
ErrorOccurredFcn must be a function handle.
Unable to create the default serialport object. Specify the ''Port'' and ''BaudRate'' input arguments.
Unable to detect connection to the serialport device. Ensure that the device is plugged in and create a new serialport object.
To set "{0}", use the "{1}" function.
Invalid number of input arguments for ''{0}''. Valid syntax is {1}.
Invalid number of input arguments for ''{0}''. Valid syntaxes are\n{1}
The specified amount of data was not returned within the Timeout period for ''readline''.{0}
The specified amount of data was not returned within the Timeout period for ''read''.{0}
The specified amount of data was not returned within the Timeout period for ''readbinblock''.{0}
{0} license is required for ''{1}'' for the serialport object.
Timeout must be a non-negative scalar double.
Additional Information:
getpinstatus({0})
setRTS({0},FLAG)
setDTR({0},FLAG)
serialbreak({0},TIME)
